category-def.name: org.eclipse.virgo.addons
category-def.label: Eclipse Virgo Add-Ons
category-def.description: This category groups the standalone add-ons that the various Eclipse Virgo products use to build the Virgo distributions. The add-ons can be installed to Eclipse Virgo distributions that don't include them in their original content, allowing the users to enhance and customize their Virgo runtimes
